definition: to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
hole/opening/orifice (of the human body)/(fig.) key (to the solution of a problem)

sentences.english: One Wow to the good life.
sentences.chinese: 一個能讓人過上幸福生活的令人驚奇的訣竅。

sentences.english: Mr. Greenblatt had a knack for working with female leads.
sentences.chinese: 格林布拉特先生深諳與女主角合作的訣竅。

sentences.english: If you ever sawed wood you already know the trick.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看過鋸木頭你就會明白其中的訣竅。

sentences.english: You have to learn the tricks of the trade if you make your own living.
sentences.chinese: 如果自己謀生的話，你必須學這行生意的訣竅。

sentences.english: The secret is a sharp knife and a firm hand .
sentences.chinese: 訣竅就是得有一把快刀，和一隻果斷的手。

sentences.english: Why is it one of the knacks to know the process?
sentences.chinese: 爲何瞭解這個過程是訣竅之一呢？

sentences.english: There are two or three tricks to being a good sailor.
sentences.chinese: 想成爲一名出色的水手是有兩三個訣竅的。

sentences.english: An easy tip for both seeming and being more self-confidence is to speak slowly.
sentences.chinese: 對於看似和實爲更自信的小訣竅就是要慢條斯理。

sentences.english: Boylan told him later, saying he had learned his trade watching Mr. Graham perform.
sentences.chinese: 他說，他在觀看格雷厄姆的表演時學會了吹牛的訣竅。

sentences.english: Should kindle fire by wonderful device!
sentences.chinese: 竟然有神妙的訣竅使火點燃？

sentences.english: Boys, do you want to know tips to go after girls?
sentences.chinese: 男生，你想知道追女生的訣竅嗎？

sentences.english: There are some tricks, exercise physiologists say, but also some risks.
sentences.chinese: 運動生理學家指出，其中有些訣竅，但也有些風險。

sentences.english: Carbon reduction expert Qiu Jizhe teaches you a few tips to save money on your utility bills.
sentences.chinese: 減碳專家邱繼哲告訴您一些節省電費的訣竅。

sentences.english: The manager of the Personnel Department told us something as to the tips of taking an interview.
sentences.chinese: 人事部經理給我們講了一些有關面試的訣竅。

sentences.english: He has a knack of teaching arithmetic.
Every good cook has his or her secrets for setting up the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 每個好的廚師都有自己的設置廚房的訣竅。

definition: a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
the key trick/the secret of success
pragmatic/flexible/to act differently in different situations/to accommodate to circumstances
move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
